extension.description: A powerful MyBatis assistant tool that supports real-time console log interception and conversion to SQL, and quick navigation between Mapper and XML files.
command.toggleLogInterceptor.title: Toggle Log Interceptor
command.showSqlOutput.title: Show SQL Output
command.clearSqlHistory.title: Clear SQL History
command.jumpToXml.title: Jump to XML
command.jumpToMapper.title: Jump to Mapper
command.refreshMappings.title: Refresh Mappings
command.refreshData.title: Refresh Data
command.testUIDisplay.title: Test UI Display
info.javaProjectActivated: Java project detected, MyBatis Helper plugin activated.
info.javaProjectDeactivated: Java project removed, MyBatis Helper plugin deactivated.
info.sampleLogsGenerated: Sample MyBatis logs generated, you can view them in the "MyBatis Test Logs" channel
info.willGeneratePlan: In actual use, this function will generate SQL execution plan
info.logInterceptorCleaned: MyBatis log interceptor resources cleaned up
warning.onlyInJavaFile: Please use this function in Java Mapper interface file
warning.onlyInXmlFile: Please use this function in XML file
error.noXmlFileFound: Corresponding XML file not found, please check if the naming and location of Mapper interface and XML file match
error.noMapperInterfaceFound: Corresponding Mapper interface not found, please check if the namespace in XML file is correct
error.javaExtensionInitFailed: Failed to initialize Java Extension API: {error}
error.javaFileNotFound: Failed to find Java file for class {className}: {error}
error.resourcePathFailed: Failed to get resource path for class {className}: {error}
status.checkingJavaProject: Checking if this is a Java project...
status.nonJavaProject: Current project is not a Java project
configuration.title: MyBatis Helper Configuration
configuration.customLogPattern.descripti: Custom log format pattern, supports regular expressions. Use %PREPARING%, %PARAMETERS%, %EXECUTION_TIME% as placeholders.
configuration.maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of SQL history records
configuration.batchProcessingDelay.descr: Delay time for batch processing logs (milliseconds)
fileMapper.noJavaProject: No Java project detected, please ensure you have opened the correct MyBatis project in VS Code
fileMapper.noXmlFile: Corresponding XML file not found, please check if the naming and location of Mapper interface and XML file match
sqlResult.title: MyBatis SQL Result
sqlResult.clickToGeneratePlan: Click the "Generate Execution Plan" button to view the execution plan
sqlResult.willGeneratePlan: In actual use, this function will generate SQL execution plan
warning.notJavaProjectOrFileMapperNotIni: Not in a Java project or file mapper not initialized
info.logInterceptorActivatedByConfig: MyBatis log interception activated by configuration change
info.logInterceptorDeactivatedByConfig: MyBatis log interception deactivated by configuration change
error.jumpToXmlFailed: Failed to jump to XML file: {error}
error.jumpToMapperFailed: Failed to jump to mapper file: {error}
